name: Bloody Blazirus
description:
The game is about a guy in a tower,
He finds the tresure but there are small parasite monsters who also wants all the gold. 
So you have to fight them of.

CONTROLS:
Use [A] and [D] to move.
[W] to jump.
[I][J][K] and [L] to look around.
Shift to jump less.

Space to instant kill if you have sword.
Shift slow fall if you have the bird

S in menu or pause you turn on and off music

POWER UPS:
There are 2 power ups sword and bird 
every time you kill a parasite there is a chance that a power up will apear

If you have the sword and you press SPACE you get an instant kill
Hint: (you can instant kill more than one monster at a time)

If you have the bird you jump higher and run faster
if you press SHIFT in air you fall slow

ENEMIES:
To kill an enemy you poke it with your knife or sword
Face its direction and just hit it
HINT: (This also works for up and down)

There are two types of enemies normal red and skeleton lightgray
they both walk with same speed but the skeleton take 3 hits to kill
when the red on only takes 2 hits to kill

when the enemies hit the chest with gold they steal some
and if they exit the screen with it you lose one helmet
HINT: (If they don't have the gold when exiting the screen you don't lose a helmet)

If they hit you with out the sword pointed at them you lose one helmet

LEVEL:
There is noly one level
When you fall down and you hit a tile
Hint: (You can jump up trugh a tile from below)

GOOD LUCK AND GOOD FIGHTING
